abilities.name: Grim Marking
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Psych Up
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Psych Up attack does 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
